Dec. 1, 1985 D Huddersfield & District BBA Contest (Section A)
Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest (Section A) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest huddersfield-district-bba-december-conte-4825
None
Huddersfield Town Hall, Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £50 and trophy, 2nd 40, 3rd £30. 4 bands competed.
Nov. 10, 2012, 1:08 p.m. June 27, 2016, 9:14 p.m.
1 Hepworth Band John Grinnell Sinfonietta for Brass Band [Langford]
2 Boarshurst 'B' Eric Landon Rhapsody in Brass
3 Queensbury Brian Dyson Journey into Freedom
4 Haworth Band Jim Wood Comedy Overture
Withdrawn Meltham and Meltham Mills Band Jack Fisher
Withdrawn Hade Edge Phil Garlick
